text: Remixes is a compilation album by Headlights released on December 9, 2008. ==Track listing== # "Cherry Tulips" (TJ Lipple) - 3:37 # "Owl Eyes" (The Buddy System) - 2:46 # "Market Girl" (The Album Leaf) - 3:45 # "School Boys" (Cale Parks) - 3:57 # "Towers" (Uzi and Ari) - 4:08 # "Everybody Needs a Fence to Lean On" (Via Satellite) - 3:06 # "So Much For the Afternoon" (Casiotone for the Painfully Alone) - 4:06 # "TV" (Son Lux) - 3:42 # "Put Us Back Together Right" (Ruby Isle) - 3:19 # "On April 2" (Jason Caddell) - 2:30 # "Your Old Street" (Spinnerty) - 4:49 # "Get Yer Head Around It" (This Show is the Rainbow) - 2:48 # "Tokyo" (Brett Sanderson) - 3:51 Category:2008 remix albums Category:Headlights (band) albums Category:Polyvinyl Record Co. remix albums
title: Remixes (Headlights album)
